DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to evaluate the safety and tolerability of fluvastatin 80 mg in a Chinese population. This study is not recruiting patients in the US.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Fluvastatin in Different Doses in Adults With Mixed Dyslipidemia or Primary Hypercholesterolemia
DOC.criteria: Mixed dyslipidemia Primary hypercholesterolemia Pregnant or lactating women Age > 18 years Other protocoldefined inclusion and exclusion criteria may apply.
